page.title: 04Baptist Church and Activity
page.content: The Baptist Church plays an important role in the community. It is an open house, and those outside the church should be able to see that they can come to find a caring friend. Youth is an important part of the church and organisations are run for those inside and outside the church today including Youth clubs, a Junior Choir and occasional summer fun days. The church becomes involved in community projects, and the team work involved strengthens community relationships. At the suggestion of the Baptist Church the musical "Greater than Gold" was performed by villagers in Alvechurch Primary School.
